sentences.en: Do you gobble up all the baby food?
sentences.cn: 你把婴儿食品都吞到你肚子里啦?

sentences.en: Don't gobble the turkey. You'll just end up getting stuffed.
sentences.cn: 别狼吞虎咽地吃火鸡,你最后会噎着的.

sentences.en: Don't gobble your food like that!
sentences.cn: 别这么狼吞虎咽地吃东西！

sentences.en: I'm going to gobble you up!
Imperialist powers always tend to gobble up their weaker neighbors.
sentences.cn: 帝国主义强国总是要想兼并弱小的邻国.

sentences.en: Papa would pretend to gobble, to emphasize this " excellence. "
sentences.cn: 爸爸假装狼吞虎咽, 以强调它的 “ 可口. ”

sentences.en: Sick of bloated browsers that gobble up too much computer memory?
sentences.cn: 你是否对那些吞噬了大量计算空间的言过其实的浏览器深恶痛绝了?

sentences.en: Some students gobble up information as fast as they receive it.
sentences.cn: 有些学生接触信息有多快,吸收就有多快.

sentences.en: The gobble sound, from the male turkeys, on the other hand, sounds exactly like you’d expect from the name and they do this all the time.
sentences.cn: 另一方面来说，雄火鸡发出的咯咯声听上去绝对就是你从它们的名字就能预料到的那样，而火鸡一直如此。

sentences.en: The white cells gobble up the invaders, and the antibodies knock them out.
sentences.cn: 白血球吞噬掉这些异物, 抗体则将其杀死.

sentences.en: Then when they trusted him the most, he would gobble them up.
sentences.cn: 就在它们最信任它的时候, 它就将它们吞食掉.

sentences.en: Treasury yields, which drop when investors gobble up U.
sentences.cn: 投资者大量吃进国债会导致国债收益率降低.

sentences.en: Unilever is more likely to gobble up smaller companies across the globe.
sentences.cn: 联合利华更喜欢在全球范围内吞下那些小点的公司.

trans.tran_en: the loud rapid gurgling sound made by male turkeys

trans.tran_cn: 贪婪地吃， 狼吞虎咽； 吞没
trans.tran_en: to eat something very quickly, especially in an impolite or  greedy  way
